author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
The past few days I haven't even been able to go on this tiny website without everyone literally worshiping this Fundy guy. With the degree of personality cult this guy has, we might as well just rename Minecraft to FundyCraft and YouTube to FundyTube. It's getting a little ridiculous.

I don't know why or how this person built up such a huge and dedicated fanbase so quickly. He just started 6 months ago and only has 34 videos so far, which are not interesting enough to go that viral 100% of the time. The only explanation I've heard is that YouTube and Twitch have him as an industry plant, which to me does seem pretty likely.

I don't know much about Fundy because he never interacts with his community at all. He may be a very nice person. I can't say. I don't want to get any dirt on him. It's just becoming very irritating having this "look at our lord Fundy" crap shoved in my face 24/7, especially knowing he hasn't even done hardly anything to get to that point. For those of you that are doing this, which is probably 90% of you right now, why? What is motivating you to worship this guy so much? Why can't the Minecraft community just go back to normal and actually being about Minecraft?

guild.description:
A guild dedicated to Minecraft! All are welcome to discuss the game, news, servers, etc.

---

Rules:

**⛏️ Minecraft-related only.** This a community dedicated to Minecraft.

**📬 No spamming.** Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

**🏛️ No politics.** There’s a time and place for those complex topics. Not here please.

**😀 Be civil. Be nice.** Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

**📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS.** This is a given.

---

Related Guilds:

+RuqqusFactions

+RuqqusCraft

+RuqqusMC

---

+Ruqquscraft Discord: https://discord.gg/gu8xCPVkdg

title: Guys, sorry for ranting so much lately, but seeing this everywhere I go starts to get annoying after a while
